getHTMLURLSafe(((string,address,bytes,ui.details: Any tags with tagType = 1/script are converted to base64 and wrapped      with <script src="data:text/javascript;base64,[SCRIPT]"></script>      [WARNING]: Large non-base64 libraries that need base64 encoding      carry a high risk of causing a gas out. Highly advised the use      of base64 encoded scripts where possible      Your HTML is returned in the following format:      <html>          <head>              [tagOpen[0]][contractRequest[0] | tagContent[0]][tagClose[0]]              [tagOpen[1]][contractRequest[0] | tagContent[1]][tagClose[1]]              ...              [tagOpen[n]][contractRequest[0] | tagContent[n]][tagClose[n]]          </head>          <body>              [tagOpen[0]][contractRequest[0] | tagContent[0]][tagClose[0]]              [tagOpen[1]][contractRequest[0] | tagContent[1]][tagClose[1]]              ...              [tagOpen[n]][contractRequest[0] | tagContent[n]][tagClose[n]]          </body>      </html>

returns._0: Full HTML with head and body tags

getHTMLURLSafe(((string,address,bytes,ui.notice: Get URL safe HTML with requested head tags and body tags
